device.description: Rocker Switch, 2 Rocker; Light and Blind Control - Application Style 1
device.longDescription: This EEP specifies a rocker switch with either 1 or 2 rockers. It can be used for F6-02-01 devices but in contrast to the default EEP supports combinations of two rockers pressed simultaneously.

device.description: Rocker Switch, 2 Rocker; Light and Blind Control - Application Style 2
device.longDescription: This EEP specifies a rocker switch with either 1 or 2 rockers. It can be used for F6-02-01 devices but in contrast to the default EEP supports combinations of two rockers pressed simultaneously.

parameter.label: Encryption
parameter.description: If set to "true" Homegear enforces encryption and discards unencrypted packets from the device.

parameter.label: Unreachable
parameter.description: Set to "true" when the device is unreachable.

parameter.label: Sticky unreachable
parameter.description: Set to "true" when the device is unreachable. It stays "true" until reset manually.

parameter.label: RSSI
parameter.description: The RSSI of the device in dBm.

parameter.label: State
parameter.description: State of the simultaneously pressed rockers A0 and B0.

parameter.label: State
parameter.description: State of the simultaneously pressed rockers A1 and B1.

parameter.label: State
parameter.description: State of the simultaneously pressed rockers A0 and B1.

parameter.label: State
parameter.description: State of the simultaneously pressed rockers A1 and B0.
